title: The Speed of Darkness
description: Book is currently not for sale so I can address problems(many noted here) as I transform it into a 5/6 book series.You can read an old version of part of the third story on Google Drive -> https://docs.google.com/document/d/1t...Nigel Hunter who thinks he is the smartest guy on Earth, finds himself caught in a world of supernatural oddities fighting his old employer (The evil Eclipse Corporation) that wants to use him as a test animal after his own mad science experiment on himself goes awry.
author: Sarah Baethge
